subject: Best medications, best prices
body:
Dear valued member.
Buy your drugs from the comfort of your home and save up to 20% on pharmaceutical products with MyCanadianPharmacy. 
Canadian products are of the same quality as American but much more cheaper. So why spend more?Just make order and your products will be delivered in a safe and timely manner directly to your home. 
To order your products just click here and follow step-by-step instructionshttp://majoryet.hk
Our customers appreciate the level of our service and fast delivery.
Sincerely yours,Leonardo Reaves
